about_the_game:
Latent Leftovers is an enchanting arcade game that combines Tetris-inspired mechanics with a whimsical tale of magical mischief. Step into the shoes of a struggling wizard, living in the shadow of a more successful rival, and embark on a quest to prove your worth. Just outside the grand wizard tower, you’ll find yourself crafting potions from leftover reagents tossed out of the open window. But not all hope is lost—a mysterious benefactor sees your hidden potential and offers a helping hand. Master the art of potion brewing across 9 unique scenarios as you climb your way to the prestigious title of Arch Wizard!

Key features:
  • Tetris-Inspired Potion Brewing: Engage in fast-paced, puzzle-based gameplay where you combine discarded magical reagents to brew powerful potions.
  • Charming Narrative: Follow the story of an underdog wizard striving to prove his worth and rise to the top of the magical world.
  • 9 Unique Scenarios: Challenge yourself with a variety of levels.
  • Free to Play: Enjoy the full experience without spending a dime—Latent Leftovers is completely free to download and play.

Step into the enchanting world of Latent Leftovers. Whether you’re a puzzle enthusiast, a lover of magical adventures, or simply looking for a fun and engaging experience, this game offers something for everyone. Ready to brew your way to greatness?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 or Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Apple GPU (M1) or Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
